pageProduct.name: Thankyou Nourishing Body Bar with Hemp Seed Oil 100g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

NOURISHING - This plant-based body bar is going to be your skins new best friend! With Australian hemp seed oil and vitamin E, this guy will cleanse and nourish your skin, leaving it happy and healthy for the day ahead. What's even better is that it's a part of our plastic-free collection - made with recirculated water and no product wastage, it's good for you and the environment. The best part? The entire range exists to help end global poverty. MADE WITH LOVE IN AUSTRALIA VEGAN FRIENDLY NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS MADE WITH NO PRODUCT WASTAGE MADE WITH RECYCLED CARDBOARD MADE WITH RECIRCULATED WATER

Warnings

But first, read this Patch test before use. Store below 25°C and in a clean dry place. Keep out of direct sunlight and pooled water. For external use only. Avoid contact with your eyes. If you experience irritation after use, please discontinue.

Common Uses

Soap Bar

Ingredients

Sodium Palmate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Water, Glycerin, Olive Fruit Oil, Fragrance, Orange Oil, Almond Extract, Clove Oil, Hemp Seed Oil, Coconut Oil (Organic), Shea Butter (Organic), Vitamin E, Kaolin, Sodium Chloride, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Sodium Gluconate

Directions

The how-to Massage the body bar over your wet skin to create a lather. Rinse off and pat dry.
